szakacs.kpi.fei.tuke.arena

Class PlayerGameProxy

  • java.lang.Object
    • szakacs.kpi.fei.tuke.arena.PlayerGameProxy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ActorManagerBasic, GameLevelBasic, PlayerManagerBasic, PlayerGameInterface
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ActorGameProxy

    public class PlayerGameProxy
extends java.lang.Object
implements PlayerGameInterface
    Used as a proxy object to make it impossible for the player to access methods of the game gameInterface he/she has no authorization to access (registerActor(), unregisterActor(), update()) by downcasting the reference to the game gameInterface from PlayerGameInterface to ActorGameInterface. This is therefore to prevent cheating on part of the player.

      • getActorsByType

        public java.util.Set<ActorBasic> getActorsByType(ActorType type)
        Description copied from interface: ActorManagerBasic
        Gets all active game actors which are of a given ActorType.
        Specified by:
        getActorsByType in interface ActorManagerBasic
        Parameters:
        type - the actor type of the actors desired.
        Returns:
        a set of all active game actors for whom ActorBasic.getType() == type. If type == ActorType.PIPESEGMENT || type == ActorType.PIPEHEAD, then an empty set is returned.

      • getPositionToActorsMap

        public java.util.Map<TunnelCellBasic,java.util.Set<ActorBasic>> getPositionToActorsMap()
        Description copied from interface: ActorManagerBasic
        Gets a mapping between tunnel cells and all actors (except pipe segments or pipe heads) located at the particular tunnel cell

        Note that no actors of types ActorType.PIPESEGMENT or ActorType.PIPEHEAD are stored and handled by the actor manager; if a query for these is performed, the returned result is an empty set.

        Specified by:
        getPositionToActorsMap in interface ActorManagerBasic
        Returns:
        a mapping between actors' current positions and actors themselves

      • getActorsBySearchCriteria

        public java.util.Set<ActorBasic> getActorsBySearchCriteria(java.util.function.Predicate<ActorBasic> predicate)
        Description copied from interface: ActorManagerBasic

        Queries the set of all currently active game actors (meaning actors whose act() method is still called) except pipe heads and pipe segments and returns a subset of them satisfying the criteria passed as argument. If no criteria is passed (null is passed) it returns all game actors.

        If getActorsByType or getPositionToActorsMap does not satisfy your particular search criteria, this is a generic search method, but beware, unlike those other methods, this method has a complexity of O(n), where n is the number of active game actors, minus pipe segments and pipe heads.

        Specified by:
        getActorsBySearchCriteria in interface ActorManagerBasic
        Parameters:
        predicate - a functional interface or lambda function used in evaluating whether the actor should be included in the query results. If null is passed, all game actors are returned.
        Returns:
        a set of all game actors satisfying the criteria specified.

      • getPositionsToPipesMap

        public java.util.Map<TunnelCellBasic,java.util.Set<ActorBasic>> getPositionsToPipesMap()
        Description copied from interface: PlayerManagerBasic
        Gets a mapping between tunnel cells and any pipe actors (pipe heads or segments) that are at these positions. Used for collision detection. Can be used to check if a position does not contain a pipe's component to avoid biting one's own or others' pipes.
        Specified by:
        getPositionsToPipesMap in interface PlayerManagerBasic
        Returns:
        a mapping between tunnel cells and pipe components.
